title: Circus Camp
description: Charlie, Katie, Grace, Jamila and Ellie are five best friends and they've just joined the Brownies! Summer has arrived, and it's time for the annual 1st Badenbridge Brownie camping weekend! They're off to Waddow Hall for the weekend, and the five best friends can hardly wait! When they arrive, the girls discover the weekend has a circus theme.
author: Caroline Plaisted
